## What We Do
1. Computational analysis as a service
2. Computational analysis consultation
3. Technical support
4. Training and workshops
5. High-performance computing resources
6. Software licenses


## Computational Analysis
::: columns
::: {.column width="75%"}
- Extensive expierience with NGS data analysis:
  - RNA-seq (bulk & single-cell)
  - ATAC-seq / ChIP-seq
  - Variant Calling
  - Genome Assembly
  - + more!
- Cost effective
:::

::: {.column width="25%"}
![](img/intro-slides/bioinformatics.jpg){width=300px}
:::
:::


## Consulting 
::: columns
::: {.column width="80%"}
- No cost for brief consultations
- Help with experimental design
- Advice on data analysis strategies
- Guidance on software and tools
- Come to us before you start your project!
:::
::: {.column width="20%"}
![](img/intro-slides/consulting.png){width=350px}
:::
:::

## Technical Support {.smaller}
::: columns
::: {.column width="70%"}
- Hit a roadblock?
  - Don't waste hours
  - Quick assistance available
    - Slack - [uconn-cbc.slack.com](uconn-cbc.slack.com)
    - Helpdesk - [https://bioinformatics.uconn.edu/bioinformatics-support/](https://bioinformatics.uconn.edu/bioinformatics-support/)
- Need help with software installation or usage?
- Assistance with data management and organization
- No cost
:::
::: {.column width="30%"}
![](img/intro-slides/tech-support.png){width=350px}
:::
:::

## Workshops {.smaller}
::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
- Monthly workshops
  - 3 days, 4 hours/day
  - Hands-on intensive training
  - Zero experience necessary
  - Leave prepared to analyze your data 

![](img/intro-slides/workshop.jpg){width=300px}
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
- Recurring Topics
  - Bulk RNA-seq
  - Single-cell RNA-seq
  - ATAC/ChIP-seq
  - Variant Calling
  - Genome Assembly
  - \+ more!
- [Schedule & Registration](https://cbc-uconn.github.io/workshops/)
:::
:::
